name: The Whites of Their Eyes
description:
A minimalist 3D Adventure/Puzzle/Platformer where you must traverse the environment and defeat giant bosses. There are no other enemies, your only tool is a magic rope, and you must figure out how to use it to get to the boss and kill it. 

Created by On Thin Ice Games:
Rishi Barnwal, Jesse Berube, Nguyen (Win) Truong, Lijie (Patric) Guo, Kelly Hui Hidalgo, and Perrin Lew

Currently in Alpha. 

Beta coming July 18, 2020.
